# RavenOS Docs (Draft)

This folder contains the initial Markdown documentation for RavenOS.

- `concepts/baas-time-locked-agents.md` — “Bot-as-a-Service” time-locked agents (lease packs)
- `concepts/backwards-compatibility.md` — legacy OpenClaw import + conversion rules
- `ops/doctor.md` — RavenOS Doctor checks + how it wraps `openclaw doctor`
- `security/vuln-scanner.md` — static pack scanning, risk gates, and reports
- `skills/image-generate.md` — built-in text-to-image tool + skill guidance
- `release/checklist.md` — pre-deploy QA checklist
